entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • #An operation was scaffolded that may result in the loss of data. Please review the migration for accuracy. #25794
  • Entity with ToQuery throws InvalidOperationException in null check after Select #25784
  • Revisit naming of `CosmosQueryableExtensions.FromSqlRaw` #25778

Closed

  • AddDbContext Split ModelBuilders in a Shared Project #25724
  • script-migrations command generates only _EFMigrationsHistory table when having multiple DbContext #25777

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Re-enable test for #22896 #25795
  • Query: Convert enum to underlying CLR type in type mapping when type … #25793
  • Query: Add regression test for #21602 #25792
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.0.5-pre20210521085756 to 2.0.5 #25788
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.0.5-pre20210521085756 to 2.0.5 #25787
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_sqlite3 from 2.0.5-pre20210521085756 to 2.0.5 #25786
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.0.5-pre20210521085756 to 2.0.5 #25785
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25771
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Fix to #24671 - Relational: No tests for TranslateContains path #25768
